Title: Prohibits the discharge of bilge water into waters of the state
Summary: Prohibits the discharge of bilge water into waters of the state from any vessel, watercraft, marina or mooring.
LawCode: Amd ยง17-0105, add ยง17-0508, En Con L; amd ยง33-c, Nav L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the navigation law, in relation to prohibiting the discharge of bilge water into waters of the state
